title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description:
This RFC aims to outline all project requirements for the BlockchainIdentityVerifier system. Key areas of focus include: 
1. Regulatory compliance (KYC, AML, GDPR) and data privacy best practices 
2. User experience considerations such as ease of use, accessibility, and intuitiveness
3. Technical requirements for blockchain integration, including consensus mechanism, smart contracts, and wallet management
4. Scalability considerations like sharding and off-chain storage
5. Performance requirements (transaction throughput, latency)
6. Disaster recovery plans. The goal is to create a secure, privacy-focused identity verification system that meets regulatory requirements while providing an intuitive user experience.

In addition, it would be beneficial to include the following in this RFC:
1. Detailed functional and non-functional requirements for each component of the system
2. A clear definition of the roles and responsibilities within the project team
3. Establishing a timeline and milestones for each phase of the project development.
4. A plan for ongoing maintenance, updates, and improvements to the system.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the blockchain integration, data storage, and user interfaces.

title: Develop Blockchain Integration
description: Implement the blockchain integration for secure and transparent identity verification and data storage.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Develop the data storage and management components, ensuring data privacy and compliance with regulations.

title: Build User Interfaces
description: Design and develop user-friendly interfaces for identity verification, data management, and system administration.

title: Implement Security and Compliance Measures
description: Ensure the system adheres to all security and compliance requirements, including data encryption, access controls, and audit trails.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the system.

title: Conduct System Testing
description: Perform comprehensive testing of the system, including functional, integration, security, and performance testing.

title: Document System Architecture and Usage
description: Create detailed documentation for the system architecture, deployment, and user guides.

title: Deploy and Launch System
description: Deploy the BlockchainIdentityVerifier system to production environments and launch for end-users.
